TextBlock.Text: Components: 3 modules connected to central chamber, with double-size gravity cannon attached to front of central module.

Reminder to communciate an estimate of the amount of gravity crystals needed to power a double-size gravity cannon to the <color=orange>Gravity Crystal Workshop</color> on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> soon!
Each chamber is to be equipped with projection pools and whiteboards to facilitate swift communication of information between Nomai aboard each module.

Crafting of new projection stones for each module is to be conveyed to Daz at the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> on Statue Island. Construction of a new warp pad to be communicated to the <color=orange>Black Hole Forge.</color>
An update: A gravity-funnel docking bay is to be installed to receive incoming shuttles instead of a warp pad, per logistical limitations of the <color=orange>Black Hole Forge.</color>

CASSAVA: The warp pad to connect Giant's Deep to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> hasn't even been constructed yet, due to the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> taking priority. Respectfully, who here was expecting us to be able to warp to the cannon?
